title.rendered: Dream Home Source Magazine Unwinds in Style with Eldorado Stone

content.rendered: Eldorado Stone’s Country Rubble Profile in River Gorge palette is sourced as a recommended exterior product in the Fall 2013 issue of Dream Home Source. Utilized in the design of a European-style cottage home, Eldorado Stone beautifully enhances the hillside scenic project that “invites you to unwind in style.”

excerpt.rendered: Eldorado Stone’s Country Rubble Profile in River Gorge palette is sourced as a recommended exterior product in the Fall 2013 issue of Dream Home Source. Utilized in the design of a European-style cottage home, Eldorado Stone beautifully enhances the hillside scenic project that “invites you to unwind in style.”
